Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The former Lord & Taylor store at Westfarms Mall is being reimagined into office space known as York Factory. The 120,000 SF site can be subdivided to 20,000 SF.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located immediately off I-84 at Exit 37

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
CBRE is pleased to offer space for lease at 30 Batterson Park Road in Farmington within the Batterson Park Road corporate office center, immediately off I-84 at Exit 37. 30 Batterson Park Road is a signature, Class A office property that is home to the national headquarters for Beazley USA and enjoys an idyllic setting adjacent to Batterson Park Pond. Neighboring corporate tenants include UTC, Carrier, Bank of America, Otis, Hartford Healthcare, New England Asset Management, and Lockton Coâ€™s. With a quiet, campus-like setting and ample on-site parking, 30 Batterson Park Road is an excellent choice for tenants seeking high quality suburban office space with a convenient Farmington
business address.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Signature Building in Farmington's Batterson Park Road Corporate Center
